settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content:
Generally shipped 1 week after placing the order
Europe usually 2 to 3 business days delivery time
Rest of the world usually 3 to 5 business days delivery time
When shipping to Non-Eu countries, additional taxes or costs (e,g, customs duties) may be incurred in the context
of your order, which are not paid by us or billed by us, but by you directly to the responsible customs authorities / or to the tax authorities For details, please contact the relevant authorities,
